name: FX Ball Remastered
description:
Originally released in 2003, this was my first original game. 

It was inspired by Seumas McNally's DX-Ball 2, Beat Ball, and other classics of the genre.

Since it was developed using Game Maker 4, the original build has problems running on new systems. 

So I decided to remaster it with Game Maker Studio 1.4, using the same graphics and levels and adding new game modes and accessibility options.

  • Classic brick-busting action
  • Amiga-style retro graphics
  • Control more than 1 paddle at a time!
  • Weapons and power-ups
  • Fast paced and balanced gameplay
  • Over 100 levels from the Deluxe version of the original release
  • Boss battles at the end of each episode
  • New extra episode, featuring a selection of the original secret levels
  • New soundtrack
  • New game modes: Survival and Boss Rush
  • Accessibility options for better visibility
